location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘A piece of land situated at Moharraq’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 330 x 224mmMaterials: Manuscript; pencil and ink (type) on paper

mods.abstract: A sketch map sent to the Political Agent at Bahrain by Charles Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (see folio 132), for the purpose of coming to a definitive arrangement with the Royal Air Force (RAF) respecting the Muharraq Aerodrome. It is divided into three sections:"A" area owned by the RAF"B" site of the old civil aerodrome, currently leased by the Air Ministry"C" an irregular shaped section of ground linking areas "A" and "B"It also roughly illustrates the position of the sea wall and an adjacent road.
